初遇.encontent:
Hi, I am Sputnik-1's ... twin sister. No, no, no, I
 don't know her.
初遇.content:
你好，我是Sputnik-1……的孪生姐妹。不，不
，我们没什么关系。

箱中气候.encontent:
Such weather is not suitable for a rocket launch. Fortunately,
 I haven't planned for one today.Ugh, another day back
 to work.
箱中气候.content:
这天气可不适合发射火箭，幸好我没有今天发射的打算。唉
，我还是打工去吧。

致未来.encontent:
First make a small goal of increasing my deposit to a favorable
 amount, and then think about where to purchase the materials.
 The materials for outer shell must be carefully selected.
致未来.content:
先制定一个小目标，将存款累计到一个可观的数字，再考
虑购买材料的渠道。飞行器外壳所用的材质一定需要精挑
细选。

孑立.encontent: Even now, the continuous electric wave never ceases.
孑立.content: 即便是现在，连绵不断的电波也未曾停息过。

问候.content:
一百一十五……一百一十六……噢！你好！我正在……糟
糕。一百一十四……一百一十五……

朝晨.encontent:
I can of course be the maid to serve you breakfast,
 as long as ... I am fairly paid.
朝晨.content:
我当然可以成为你的早餐女仆，只要……你能适当给点报
酬。

信任-朝晨.encontent:
If it's alright, please take the serviette and gently
 wipe ... Yeah, right here! Thank you so very much.
信任-朝晨.content:
方便的话，可以请你用餐巾擦拭一下……对，就是这里！非
常感谢。

夜暮.encontent:
The moon, the stars, eventually, I will be among them
 ...
夜暮.content: 月亮，星星，总有一天，我也会成为它们那般……

信任-夜暮.encontent:
For any satellites, night and day would have made no
 difference. But for me, a night like this allows you
 to see me in the sky.
信任-夜暮.content:
对于卫星来说，夜晚与白日并无不同。对于我来说，它们
的不同在于，能否让你在天空中望见我。

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
Bright but not too dazzling, I think orange suits me
 really well.
帽檐与发鬓.content: 鲜明又不至于过于醒目，我想橘色很适合我。

袖与手.encontent:
Sorry, I haven't received your signal yet. Please be
 patient.
袖与手.content: 抱歉，我暂时还没能接收到你的信号，请再等等。

衣着与身形.encontent:
What a beautiful blue planet. It is so fascinating, so stunningly
 charming. I once saw it ...  I mean I once saw the picture of
 such scenery from "elsewhere."
衣着与身形.content:
美丽的湛蓝色星球，它是那样迷人，甚至于动人心魄，我
曾看……我是说，我曾在“别处”欣赏到这副光景。

嗜好.encontent:
I need more money, more money!I might sound shallow
 and greedy, but it will enable us, all of us, to be
 in a better place.
嗜好.content:
我想要更多的金钱，更多更多的钱！或许它听起来浅薄而
轻浮，但它能垫起我们，让我们能够到更高处的“东西”。

赞赏.encontent:
You shine luminously and gloriously, it is even visible
 from space. You have my word.
赞赏.content:
属于你的光芒闪亮而耀眼，即使在大气层之上也清晰可见
。我向你保证。

亲昵.encontent:
In the very, very, very distant future, I will leave
 this place. I swear I will miss you. Please remember
 me.
亲昵.content:
在十分十分十分遥远的未来，我会离开这个地方。我发誓
，我会想你的，请你也记得怀念我。

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
How about Explorer-3? Oh, I have to say he looked brilliant.
 But compared to Phobos-1, he's just like an ... immature
 little boy.
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
你说“探险者三号”怎么样？噢，我承认他看起来很棒。但
比起“福波斯一号”，他……就像一个还未发育的小男孩
。

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
DUU-DUU-BELL-BOO from the other side of the atmosphere,
 is so special and unique that I almost know nothing
 about it. What a negligence!
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
来自大气圈后的“DUU-DUU-BELL-BOO”，它
那么特殊、奇特，但我居然对此一无所知，真是一项重大
的失职！

独白.encontent:
Oh, alright, it's nothing miraculous. The birth of new life comes
 unexpectedly.I just suddenly learnt how to hear, speak and think.
 Therefore, I was derailed from the scheduled track and started
 to embrace my "life."
独白.content:
哦，好吧，其实也没什么了不起的，生命降临得很突然。我
忽然就能听，说，思考了。于是我偏离了预定的轨道，走
向我自己的“人生”。

战前.encontent: According to the NDA, we must wipe out all witnesses.
战前.content: 根据保密条例，我们必须清除目击者。

择选至终的仪式.encontent: Final check complete. Start the countdown.

战斗胜利.encontent:
It's over. Hopefully the victory won't make me more
 recognizable.
战斗胜利.content: 结束了，希望这一切不会让我变得更出名。

洞悉.encontent:
My travel fund is growing steadily. Thank you very
 much for your support.
洞悉.content: 旅行基金的数额稳定上升，非常感谢你的支持。
